item.text: Now one Sabbath when Jesus went to dine at the house of a leader of the Pharisees, they were watching him closely.

There<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2400">right</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1715" class="">in front of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> was a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> whose body <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="5203">swollen with fluid</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2036" class="">asked</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3544">experts in religious law</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st>, “Is it <st data-num="1832" class="">lawful</st> to <st data-num="2323" class="">heal</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they <st data-num="2270">remained silent</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1949">took hold</st> of the man,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="630" class="">sent</st> him <st data-num="630">away</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101" class="">Which</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, if you have a <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> an <st data-num="1016" class="">ox</st> that has <st data-num="4098" class="">fallen</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="5421" class="">well</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>, will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2112" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="385" class="">pull</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="385">out</st>?”
But they could not reply to this.
Then when Jesus noticed how the guests chose the places of honor, he told them a parable. He said to them,

“<st data-num="3752">When</st> you are <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="1062">wedding feast</st>,<n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2625" class="">take</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4411">place of honor</st> <st data-num="3379" class="">because</st> a person <st data-num="1784">more distinguished</st> than <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may have <st data-num="1510">been</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846">your host</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the host who <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="2532 846">both</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="1325">Give</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st> your <st data-num="5117" class="">place.’</st> <st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st>, <st data-num="152" class="">ashamed</st>,<n id="2" /> you will <st data-num="757">begin</st> to <st data-num="2722" class="">move</st> to the <st data-num="2078">least important</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> you are <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st>, <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="377" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="2078">least important</st> <st data-num="511" class="">place</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">host</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">approaches</st> he will <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="5384">Friend</st>, <st data-num="4320">move up</st> here to a <st data-num="511">better place</st>.’<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">honored</st> in the <st data-num="1799" class="">presence</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="4873">share the meal</st> with <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.
For everyone who exalts himself will be humbled, but the one who humbles himself will be exalted.”

He said also to the man who had invited him, “When you host a dinner or a banquet, don’t invite your friends or your brothers or your relatives or rich neighbors so you can be invited by them in return and get repaid.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> you <st data-num="4160" class="">host</st> an <st data-num="1403">elaborate meal</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2564" class="">invite</st> the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>, the <st data-num="376" class="">crippled</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5560" class="">lame</st>, and<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>.<n id="4" />
Then you will be blessed because they cannot repay you, for you will be repaid at the resurrection of the righteous.”
When one of those at the meal with Jesus heard this, he said to him, “Blessed is everyone who will feast in the kingdom of God!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “A <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> once <st data-num="4160" class="">gave</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="1173" class="">banquet</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> guests.<n id="4" />

At<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st> for the <st data-num="1173" class="">banquet</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="3004">tell</st> those who had been <st data-num="2564" class="">invited</st>, ‘<st data-num="2064">Come</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> everything <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">now</st> <st data-num="2092" class="">ready.’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> after another they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="3868" class="">make excuses</st>.<n id="2" /> The <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘I have <st data-num="59" class="">bought</st> a <st data-num="68" class="">field</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="2192 318">must</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">go out</st> and <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>. Please <st data-num="3868" class="">excuse</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me.’</st><n id="4" />

<st data-num="2087" class="">Another</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘I have <st data-num="59" class="">bought</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="2201" class="">yoke</st> of <st data-num="1016" class="">oxen</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I am <st data-num="4198">going out</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1381" class="">examine</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. Please <st data-num="3868" class="">excuse</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me.’</st>

<st data-num="2087" class="">Another</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘I just got <st data-num="1060">married</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come.’</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> <st data-num="3854">came back</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="518" class="">reported</st> this to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st>. <st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3617">master of the household</st> was <st data-num="3710" class="">furious</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>, ‘<st data-num="1831">Go out</st> <st data-num="5030" class="">quickly</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4113" class="">streets</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4505" class="">alleys</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1521">bring in</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="376" class="">crippled</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5560" class="">lame.’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>, <st data-num="3739">what</st> you <st data-num="2004" class="">instructed</st> has been <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">room.’</st><n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2962" class="">master</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> his<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>, ‘<st data-num="1831">Go out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">highway</st>s<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5418">country roads</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="315" class="">urge</st><n id="5" /> people<n id="6" /> to <st data-num="1525">come in</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> will be <st data-num="1072" class="">filled</st>.<n id="7" />
For I tell you, not one of those individuals who were invited will taste my banquet!’”
Now large crowds were accompanying Jesus, and turning to them he said,

“<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3404" class="">hate</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">his own</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sisters</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="5590">life</st>,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciple</st>.

<st data-num="3748" class="">Whoever</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="941" class="">carry</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">follow</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciple</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2309" class="">wanting</st> to <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st> a <st data-num="4444" class="">tower</st>, <st data-num="3780">doesn’t</st> <st data-num="2523">sit down</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4413">first</st> and <st data-num="5585" class="">compute</st> the <st data-num="1160" class="">cost</st><n id="2" /> to see <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> enough money <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="535" class="">complete</st> it?

<st data-num="3379" class="">Otherwise</st>,<n id="1" /> when <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> has <st data-num="5087" class="">laid</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="2310" class="">foundation</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> is <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="1615" class="">finish</st> the tower,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> it<n id="4" /> will <st data-num="757">begin</st> to <st data-num="1702">make fun of</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

They will <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="444">man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="1615" class="">finish!’</st><n id="3" />

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="935" class="">king</st>, <st data-num="4198">going out</st> to <st data-num="4820" class="">confront</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st> <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4171" class="">battle</st>, will <st data-num="3780" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2523">sit down</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4413">first</st> and <st data-num="1011" class="">determine</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">whether</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">able</st> <st data-num="1722">with</st> <st data-num="1176 5505" class="">10,000</st> to <st data-num="5221" class="">oppose</st><n id="2" /> the one <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1501 5505" class="">20,000</st>?

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="3361" class="">cannot</st> succeed,<n id="1" /> he will <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> a <st data-num="4242" class="">representative</st><n id="2" /> while the other <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> a <st data-num="4206">long way off</st> and <st data-num="2065">ask for</st> <st data-num="3588">terms</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">of</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>.<n id="3" />
In the same way therefore not one of you can be my disciple if he does not renounce all his own possessions.
“Salt is good, but if salt loses its flavor, how can its flavor be restored?
It is of no value for the soil or for the manure pile; it is to be thrown out. The one who has ears to hear had better listen!”
